conversations.content:

Great, add sections for snacks and action items in the new note.

tool_call: contentManager_appendContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731001500456_m2p7v9r4x", "workspaceId": "ws_1731001488000_s4k9n1t6c", "sessionDescription": "Prep book club agenda", "sessionMemory": "Duplicated 2025-10-31.md to 2025-11-07.md", "toolContext": "Add snacks + action sections", "primaryGoal": "Update Book Club/Meeting Notes/2025-11-07.md", "subgoal": "Append Snacks and Action Items blocks"}, "filePath": "Book Club/Meeting Notes/2025-11-07.md", "content": "
## Snacks
- [ ] Warm cider station
- [ ] Savory hand pies

## Action Items
- Assign discussion leader for next week
- Draft questions for chapters 12-15
"}

Result: {"success": true, "data": {"filePath": "Book Club/Meeting Notes/2025-11-07.md", "appendedLength": 196, "totalLength": 1724}, "workspaceContext": {"workspaceId": "ws_1731001488000_s4k9n1t6c", "workspacePath": ["Book Club", "Meeting Notes", "2025-11-07.md"], "activeWorkspace": true}}

Added Snacks and Action Items to the new agenda. Anything else before the meeting?
